StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateMedicalExamForPerson]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: ( @PersonID INT ) AS SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY CME.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID ) AS ID, CME.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, CME.MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE, CME.MEDICAL_EXAM_TYPE, CME.MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID, CME.P_GENERAL_BODY_BUILD, CME.U_UPPER_BODY, CME.L_LOWER_BODY, CME.H_HEARING, CME.E_EYES, CME.S_MENTAL_PSYCHOLOGICAL, CME.VISUAL_COLOR, CME.VISUAL_COLOR_DISPOSITION, CME.LEFT_CORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, CME.RIGHT_CORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, CME.LEFT_UNCORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, CME.RIGHT_UNCORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, CME.HEIGHT, CME.WEIGHT, COALESCE(MD.MEDICAL_DISPOSITION_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS MEDICAL_DISPOSITION_CODE, --COALESCE(MD.MEDICAL_DISPOSITION_ID, 0) AS MEDICAL_DISPOSITION_ID, COALESCE(CME.CONSULTATION_TYPE, SPACE(0)) AS CONSULTATION_TYPE, CME.RETEST_ELIGIBILITY_DATE, CME.D_DRUGS FROM CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM CME WITH ( NOLOCK ) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICAL_DISPOSITION MD ON CASE CME.MEDICAL_DISPOSITION WHEN 'D' THEN 'DQ' ELSE CME.MEDICAL_DISPOSITION END = MD.MEDICAL_DISPOSITION_CODE WHERE CME.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID;
